backend/main.mo: Defines a simple canister actor exposing a query method that returns a status text.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing implemented frontend files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one-line summaries for key frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component with a themed welcome UI, form for app idea input, and backend status display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook for fetching backend status using the actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based stylesheet defining a warm amber/orange theme with OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file mounting the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, radii, shadows, fonts, and animations using custom CSS variables.
